name: Microsoft Exchange Server Database Check File
summary: Learn about .CHCK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Microsoft Exchange Server is a business server that allows users to send emails and maintain a calendar and contacts list. Administrators can perform health checks of Exchange Server databases. Doing so produces a CHCK file.

description: A CHCK file is created as a result of health monitoring checks on Microsoft Exchange Server. It contains informaiton about the overall status and operationalization of the server’s database. Microsoft Exchange Server is used primarily as emailing server and lets you maintain your business contacts and calendars. Exchange server administrators use its EseUtil to check it’s database health.
A CHCK file is a database check file created by Microsoft Exchange Server. It contains information about a database's health. CHCK files are created using Microsoft Exchange Server's EseUtil.
